about_the_game:
Game introduction

DLC unlocks new tags for the Workshop !
This is a puzzle game that supports extended content !

Extended picture

You can import any picture you like into the game, support jpg, png format

Workshop

The game supports creative workshops, you can upload and download artwork

Graffiti function

The game has a built-in doodle tool that can add content to the picture !

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some naked and pornographic content, All characters are over 18 years old

name: Happy Engine - Patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 140 MB available space

short_description: DLC unlocks new tags for the Workshop !
supported_languages: English, German, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
